PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04542011-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  EC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRelease and Environmental Emergency Notification Regulations
PrecisRELEASE AND ENVIRONMENTAL EMERGENCY NOTIFICATION REGULATIONS designate under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 and prescribe under the Fisheries Act, respectively, the persons providing 24-hour emergency telephone service for the organization operating for the provincial and territorial government, enabling them to receive notifications that, otherwise, have to be made directly to Environment Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0090 Publication Date: 2011-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Release and Environmental Emergency Notification Regulations
precis: RELEASE AND ENVIRONMENTAL EMERGENCY NOTIFICATION REGULATIONS designate under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 and prescribe under the Fisheries Act, respectively, the persons providing 24-hour emergency telephone service for the organization operating for the provincial and territorial government, enabling them to receive notifications that, otherwise, have to be made directly to Environment Canada.
